posts.content:
I've not been watching the bus Bruce's over the last few years but would I be right in saying that generally the prices have started to go down a bit ?

I'm thinking of selling "my 66 sundial" and I'm curious as to what kind of money to ask for ?

Jason

Is this a real question?

Are prices going up or down "a bit"?? Do you mean trends overall for all buses, or specific models in specific conditions?? There are so many variables involved it is impossible to answer this.

If money/price is your main concern, just look at other same spec/condition buses and what they are going for. Google makes it very easy.

Do you want to maximise the profit on your bus or are you happy to sell it at a reasonable current market value??

Perhaps you could sell it for what you paid and allow another family with young kids to know what it's like to experience the joy and pleasure of camping and touring around the UK and maybe Europe??? We are all just guardians of these amazing vehicles. It's a lifestyle, not a cash cow.

Pass it on.

Anything is only worth what someone is prepared to pay for it!
eBay principle!
Bears no relation to how much or little you paid for it, what you have spent or what others have sold for...
If you want to sell.. work out what it was worth to you and sell or store in a lock up to enjoy when you have done your thing..
Karma!
I love my buses.. blood sweat n tears..
G
WHS ^
